import React,{useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import'./App.css';import Header from'./components/Header';import HeroSection from'./components/HeroSection';import ProblemStatement from'./components/ProblemStatement';// import Features from './components/Features';
import HowItWorks from'./components/HowItWorks';import SubscriptionPlans from'./components/SubscriptionPlans';import DailyMenu from'./components/DailyMenu';import Testimonials from'./components/Testimonials';import DeliveryMap from'./components/DeliveryMap';import FAQ from'./components/FAQ';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import{createScrollObserver}from'./lib/utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// Optimized scroll observer callback
const handleIntersection=useCallback(entries=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add('active');// Performance optimization: cleanup will-change after animation
setTimeout(()=>{entry.target.style.willChange='auto';},600);}});},[]);useEffect(()=>{// Mark document as JS-enabled for CSS transitions
document.body.classList.add('js-enabled');// Optimized intersection observer with better performance settings
const observer=createScrollObserver(handleIntersection,{threshold:0.1,rootMargin:'50px 0px -50px 0px'// More generous margins for better UX
});// Apply to any .section-fade elements with performance optimization
const fadeElements=document.querySelectorAll('.section-fade');// Use requestAnimationFrame for better performance
const observeElements=()=>{fadeElements.forEach(section=>{observer.observe(section);});};// Delay observation to ensure DOM is ready
if(fadeElements.length>0){requestAnimationFrame(observeElements);}// Cleanup function
return()=>{observer.disconnect();// Clean up any remaining will-change properties
fadeElements.forEach(el=>{if(el.style){el.style.willChange='auto';}});};},[handleIntersection]);// Performance monitoring (development only)
useEffect(()=>{if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){// Monitor for layout thrashing
